entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
